name: Too many inputs
description:
Try every button and lever and guide the robot to the end of the level.
Use overcomplicated contraptions in order to overcome really simple puzzles.

Credits:

Game Design / 2D Animations:      Stefano Rizzo

Game Design / Programming:      Gabriele Ferreccio

Programming:      Francesco Micheletti

2D Concept Art:    Guglielmo Meacci

3D Models / TechArt:    Giona Ghiglione

Sound Designer:   Alessia Mazzocchi
